amendment.description: Amendment to the Watt amendment (A001) incorporates Congressional findings with respect to the status of the Cherokee Freedmen.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Watt amendment which incorporates Congressional findings with respect to the status of the Cherokee Freedmen.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Boren to the Watt amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boren amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
